title: Art Walk
short_description: Join the Evening Associates on this year's Art Walk and explore galleries open late just for you. Follow a custom route through the River North neighborhood, experiencing a wide variety of art from around the world.
list_description: Join the Evening Associates on this year's Art Walk and explore galleries open late just for you. Follow a custom route through the River North neighborhood, experiencing a wide variety of art from around the world.
description:
Join the Evening Associates at Art Walk and explore galleries open late just for you. Follow a custom route through the River North neighborhood, experiencing a wide variety of art from around the world, including sculpture, ceramics, prints, paintings, photography, and installation art. End the night at the official after-party at Clutch Bar.

GALLERIES
Addington Gallery
Andrew Bae Gallery
Gallery Victor Armendariz
Jean Albano Gallery
Ken Saunders Gallery*
Swaby
The Rangefinder Gallery
Zg Gallery

*Starting location: Ken Saunders Gallery, 230 West Superior Street.

Event co-chairs: Brandon Belt and Catherine Roberts

Proceeds from Art Walk support the Evening Associates’ mission to fund exhibitions at the Art Institute devoted to today’s emerging artists. Attendees must be 21+ and valid ID is required upon entry.

Follow the Evening Associates on Facebook for the latest news and other events. @ArtInstitueEA #ArtWalkChi
buy_button_caption: $15 Evening Associates, $25 members and students, $35 nonmembers
